page.title: 09INDUSTRY TOURISM AND CRAFT
page.content: An important industry in our area is tourism. Many shops and hotels depend on a busy tourist season. The tourist officer is based in Dornoch and there is a tourist office to help visitors find suitable places to stay. The Highland Regional Council has helped set up an industrial estate on the site of the disused station. These are small units which are mainly used as craft workshops. We went on a visit the workshop 'Treecraft', which makes boomerangs, shinty sticks and garden furniture. The boomerangs are sold all over the world. Another craft workshop 'Highland Armoury' make copies of old weapons such as targes, claymores and dirks . At 'Dornoch Glass' you can see glass flowers being made. Grants of Dornoch is a well known local butcher. They send meat to shops in Inverness, Glasgow and Edinburgh.
